item.description:
Come check out the Comedy Connection...we will be watching the R Rated Hypnotist, Frank Santos! You can call just to reserve your seats or go ahead and purchase them, be sure to give them my name (Kat Johnston) so that your seats will be with all of us. The show starts at 8, doors open at 7, we will meet at 7:30!

YOU NEED TO BUY YOUR TICKETS ASAP TO MAKE SURE YOU CAN GET A SEAT WITH THE GROUP!

Hope you can make it for some good laughs!
item.name: The R Rated Hypnotist
